snippet.title: Kawaii Killer - First Trailer!
snippet.description:
Kawaii Killer Plushy Edition on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/kawaii-killer-plushy-edition/id911787686?ls=1&mt=8

Kawaii Killer on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabemasu.kawaii.google

Kawaii Killer Demo (free) on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabemasu.kawaii.demo

http://www.kawaii-killer.com
Tabemasu Games proudly presents Kawaii Killer, an epic & fun cartoon-gore game for iOS / Android / Windows Phone 8 Tablet computers and Smarphones. The goal is simple: you are Davy, a young trapper walking in the woods. You'll meet a whole bunch of cute animals that you'll have to kill restlessly.

But beware! Each animal is special! If the fox needs only a simple tap to be killed, you'll have to perform a slice to kill a rabbit, while the frog needs to be torn apart using two fingers! You'll have to face 14 different animals in Arcade mode, beat the timer in Speedrun mode, win badges and medals in dozens of alternative challenges!
